overview: Snooky lives with a family where the henpecked husband does the washing and takes care of his wife while she rests up in a hammock and his children play with various pets. When one of the children is carried off by an escaped bunch of balloons Snooky goes about rescuing the baby from multiple dangerous situations.
tagline: YOU'LL LAUGH AY "SNOOKS" THE ALMOST HUMAN MONKEY in his Clever Two Reel Comedy "THE ONE BEST PET"
title: The One Best Pet
